String.Source: Cure Addiction (<Global=ServiceCostCureAddict> Caps)
String.Dest: Vyléčit závislost (<Global=ServiceCostCureAddict> zátek)

String.Source: I'm Not Radiated
String.Dest: Nemám nemoc z ozáření

String.Source: Not Interested
String.Dest: Nezájem

String.Source: Not Interested
String.Dest: Nezájem

String.Source: What Brought You Here?
String.Dest: What Brought You Here?

String.Source: Never Mind
String.Dest: Nevadí

String.Source: Cure Me
String.Dest: Vyleč mě

String.Source: No Chem Addictions
String.Dest: Žádná závislost na chemikáliích

String.Dest: Vyleč mě

String.Source: Nothing

String.Source: Cure Health (<Global=ServiceCostCureWoundsSmall> Caps)
String.Dest: Uzdravit (<Global=ServiceCostCureWoundsSmall> zátek)

String.Source: I'm Healthy
String.Dest: Jsem v pořádku

String.Source: Cure Me
String.Dest: Vyleč mě

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: Outpost news?
String.Dest: Novinky ze základny?

String.Source: I'll think about it
String.Dest: Rozmyslím si to

String.Source: Wipe them out?
String.Dest: Wipe them out?

String.Source: Trust me
String.Dest: Věř mi

String.Source: Don't get in my way
String.Dest: Don't get in my way

String.Source: I'll stop helping raiders
String.Dest: Nebudu pomáhat nájezdníkům

String.Source: I'll wipe them out
String.Dest: I'll wipe them out

String.Source: No way
String.Dest: Ani náhodou

String.Source: Make things right?
String.Dest: Náprava?

String.Source: How Do I Fight?
String.Dest: How Do I Fight?

String.Source: I'll Fight in the Arena
String.Dest: I'll Fight in the Arena

String.Source: I'm Not Going to Fight
String.Dest: I'm Not Going to Fight

String.Source: Set Them Free
String.Dest: Set Them Free

String.Source: Barter
String.Dest: Obchodovat

String.Source: Cure Dark Craving (<Global=ServiceCostCureAddict> Caps)
String.Dest: Vyléčit temné chutě (<Global=ServiceCostCureAddict> zátek)

String.Source: Not trying to be rude here, but I've run some mediocre gangs in the past. But they all at least had water to drink. Unlike this place.
String.Dest: Not trying to be rude here, but I've run some mediocre gangs in the past. But they all at least had water to drink. Unlike this place.

String.Source: People are pretty pissed at the lack of beds you got going on here... boss. Might want to show a little competency and do something about it.
String.Dest: People are pretty pissed at the lack of beds you got going on here... boss. Might want to show a little competency and do something about it.

String.Source: I bet I got something you'd want around here somewhere.
String.Dest: I bet I got something you'd want around here somewhere.

String.Source: Tired of watching your back? I got some extra protection that could help with that.
String.Dest: Tired of watching your back? I got some extra protection that could help with that.

String.Source: This water situation's bullshit. You better fix it, or start watching your back.
String.Dest: This water situation's bullshit. You better fix it, or start watching your back.

String.Source: Right. You're the boss.
String.Dest: Right. You're the boss.

String.Source: Whatever. Selling stuff sucks.
String.Dest: Whatever. Selling stuff sucks.

String.Source: Used clothing here. Don't worry about the blood stains. They're free.
String.Dest: Used clothing here. Don't worry about the blood stains. They're free.

String.Source: All right, I guess.
String.Dest: All right, I guess.

String.Source: Yeah, well thanks for wasting my time.
String.Dest: Yeah, well thanks for wasting my time.

String.Source: Tell you the truth, boss, we'll be hard pressed if trouble shows up until we get some more defenses around here.
String.Dest: Tell you the truth, boss, we'll be hard pressed if trouble shows up until we get some more defenses around here.

String.Source: I'm fine. This scratch isn't gonna keep me down.
String.Dest: I'm fine. This scratch isn't gonna keep me down.

String.Source: Those big ugly bastards sure hit us hard.
String.Dest: Tihle velcí oškliví bastardi nás zasáhli rozhodně tvrdě.

String.Source: This place needs repairs, unless you want us to torch the place and start over?
String.Dest: This place needs repairs, unless you want us to torch the place and start over?

String.Source: Does it look like anything ever happens around here?
String.Dest: Does it look like anything ever happens around here?

String.Source: Can't complain.
String.Dest: Can't complain.

String.Source: You must be the Overboss. Trying to get in good with Nisha, here, so anything you need done, just say the word.
String.Dest: You must be the Overboss. Trying to get in good with Nisha, here, so anything you need done, just say the word.

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: Dobrá.

String.Source: Not right now.
String.Dest: Teď ne.

String.Source: Nothing a bottle of vodka won't fix.
String.Dest: Nothing a bottle of vodka won't fix.

String.Source: I hope the lack of beds here isn't intentional. I don't sleep, I get cranky. I get cranky, people die. Get it?
String.Dest: I hope the lack of beds here isn't intentional. I don't sleep, I get cranky. I get cranky, people die. Get it?

String.Source: I've got all sorts of toys for all types of killing.
String.Dest: I've got all sorts of toys for all types of killing.

String.Source: If I don't have it, you don't need it.
String.Dest: If I don't have it, you don't need it.

String.Source: Don't worry. I won't judge you if you're buying.
String.Dest: Don't worry. I won't judge you if you're buying.

String.Source: I wish. This place is about as exciting as a rotting brahmin.
String.Dest: I wish. This place is about as exciting as a rotting brahmin.

String.Source: Brotherhood should learn to mind their own damn business. I don't try and waltz into their hot air balloon.
String.Dest: Brotherhood should learn to mind their own damn business. I don't try and waltz into their hot air balloon.

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: Fajn.

String.Source: Looking for something new to wear?
String.Dest: Looking for something new to wear?

String.Source: What, here in Dullsville? Sorry, boss. Nothing comes to mind.
String.Dest: What, here in Dullsville? Sorry, boss. Nothing comes to mind.

String.Source: I haven't shared a bed since I was a kid, and I'm sure as shit not doing it now.
String.Dest: I haven't shared a bed since I was a kid, and I'm sure as shit not doing it now.

String.Source: Honestly, outpost's got a water problem. There isn't enough. And people are starting to get mad.
String.Dest: Honestly, outpost's got a water problem. There isn't enough. And people are starting to get mad.

String.Source: Crew's been getting awfully hungry. Could really use more food coming in, boss.
String.Dest: Crew's been getting awfully hungry. Could really use more food coming in, boss.

String.Source: A lucky shot. Won't happen again.
String.Dest: A lucky shot. Won't happen again.

String.Source: Besides the obvious shortage of clean water? Don't get me wrong, helps my business, but no one likes to deal with this many drunks.
String.Dest: Besides the obvious shortage of clean water? Don't get me wrong, helps my business, but no one likes to deal with this many drunks.

String.Source: Not right now.
String.Dest: Teď ne.

String.Source: This whole bed situation's pretty shitty, boss. Believe me, we've killed for less.
String.Dest: This whole bed situation's pretty shitty, boss. Believe me, we've killed for less.

String.Source: Yeah, yeah, I'm new, so what. You got something for me to do, say it.
String.Dest: Yeah, yeah, I'm new, so what. You got something for me to do, say it.

String.Source: Just don't waste my time.
String.Dest: Just don't waste my time.

String.Source: Well, look, outpost's nice and all, but you know what would really make this place - more food. Any you got would go a long way.
String.Dest: Well, look, outpost's nice and all, but you know what would really make this place - more food. Any you got would go a long way.

String.Source: Then why the hell are we speaking?
String.Dest: Then why the hell are we speaking?

String.Source: There ain't enough beds around here. People are fighting for 'em now. This ain't gonna end pretty.
String.Dest: There ain't enough beds around here. People are fighting for 'em now. This ain't gonna end pretty.

String.Source: Good to be out of that tin can.
String.Dest: Good to be out of that tin can.

String.Source: We're busting our asses getting this place fixed up. Could use some help.
String.Dest: We're busting our asses getting this place fixed up. Could use some help.

String.Source: Buy yourself a drink? I know you got the caps.
String.Dest: Buy yourself a drink? I know you got the caps.

String.Source: If you're worried about added protection, let me ease those fears.
String.Dest: If you're worried about added protection, let me ease those fears.

String.Source: Yeah, let me show you.
String.Dest: Jo, dovol mi ti ukázat.

String.Source: Not right now, thanks.
String.Dest: Teď ne, díky.

String.Source: Thanking me, eh? How'd a softie like you get in charge?
String.Dest: Thanking me, eh? How'd a softie like you get in charge?

String.Source: I used to be scared of Super Mutants, but we taught them a lesson this time.
String.Dest: Supermutanti u mě vyvolávali do teď strach, ale tentokrát jsme jim dali lekci.

String.Source: Did you need anything?
String.Dest: Potřebujete něco?

String.Source: Well, in case you haven't noticed, you've got more mouths to feed than food to go around. Might want to act before the natives get restless.
String.Dest: Well, in case you haven't noticed, you've got more mouths to feed than food to go around. Might want to act before the natives get restless.

String.Source: Doing alright. I might actually end up liking it here.
String.Dest: Doing alright. I might actually end up liking it here.

String.Source: Sitting on top of the world out here, boss.
String.Dest: Sitting on top of the world out here, boss.

String.Source: What the hell was that? Institute using us to clean up their trash?
String.Dest: What the hell was that? Institute using us to clean up their trash?

String.Source: If I wanted to sleep on dirt, I never woulda left my moms. Come on, boss. How about a couple more beds for fucksake.
String.Dest: If I wanted to sleep on dirt, I never woulda left my moms. Come on, boss. How about a couple more beds for fucksake.

String.Source: Need some more beds, boss. I don't mind sleeping with my dogs, but some people do.
String.Dest: Need some more beds, boss. I don't mind sleeping with my dogs, but some people do.

String.Source: Outpost could certainly benefit from some beefier defenses. Feel like we're sitting ducks out here.
String.Dest: Outpost could certainly benefit from some beefier defenses. Feel like we're sitting ducks out here.

String.Source: Actually, place is a little light on defenses, boss. Could do with some beefed up security.
String.Dest: Actually, place is a little light on defenses, boss. Could do with some beefed up security.

String.Source: Look around at this place. It's a shit hole. Maybe you can help us fix up the place?
String.Dest: Look around at this place. It's a shit hole. Maybe you can help us fix up the place?

String.Source: Got this outpost set up pretty damn well, boss. One thing it needs, though. More food.
String.Dest: Got this outpost set up pretty damn well, boss. One thing it needs, though. More food.

String.Source: Come on, Overboss. Relax. Have a drink.
String.Dest: Come on, Overboss. Relax. Have a drink.

String.Source: Actually, getting enough to drink's been a problem. Unless we get access to some clean water, I think there's going to be trouble.
String.Dest: Actually, getting enough to drink's been a problem. Unless we get access to some clean water, I think there's going to be trouble.

String.Source: Sure, let's see what you've got.
String.Dest: Jasně... ukaž, co máš.

String.Source: Looking to make a mess of someone? You've come to the right place.
String.Dest: Looking to make a mess of someone? You've come to the right place.

String.Source: You got the caps, I got the goods.
String.Dest: Ty máš zátky, já mám věci.

String.Source: Curiosity fulfilled. All yours.
String.Dest: Curiosity fulfilled. All yours.

String.Source: I mean, to be honest with you, none of us signed up to starve. Outpost needs more food. And soon. Please.
String.Dest: I mean, to be honest with you, none of us signed up to starve. Outpost needs more food. And soon. Please.

String.Source: I hope you're here to do something about the sorry ass water supply we got going on.
String.Dest: I hope you're here to do something about the sorry ass water supply we got going on.

String.Source: Are you going to hook us up with some decent water, or what?
String.Dest: Are you going to hook us up with some decent water, or what?

String.Source: Gladly. That thing's like a death trap.
String.Dest: Gladly. That thing's like a death trap.

String.Source: Who do I need to rough up around here to get some more food? Seriously.
String.Dest: Who do I need to rough up around here to get some more food? Seriously.

String.Source: Go ahead.
String.Dest: Pokračuj.

String.Source: Need a little something to make your next kill extra special?
String.Dest: Need a little something to make your next kill extra special?

String.Source: Whatever.
String.Dest: Když to říkáš.

String.Source: So, you're the Overboss. Anything I can do around here besides slowly die of boredom?
String.Dest: So, you're the Overboss. Anything I can do around here besides slowly die of boredom?

String.Source: I prefer my kills up close anyway.
String.Dest: I prefer my kills up close anyway.

String.Source: Here to make some trades?
String.Dest: Here to make some trades?

String.Source: Clothing for all shapes and sizes. Much like the corpses they came from.
String.Dest: Clothing for all shapes and sizes. Much like the corpses they came from.

String.Source: Need a drink?
String.Dest: Potřebuješ drink?

String.Source: Starving here, boss. Need more food coming in.
String.Dest: Starving here, boss. Need more food coming in.

String.Source: Only the best.
String.Dest: Only the best.

String.Source: Maybe someone in the Institute really does know a thing or two. Either way, this is one hell of a mess.
String.Dest: Maybe someone in the Institute really does know a thing or two. Either way, this is one hell of a mess.

String.Source: Sure, let's see what you've got.
String.Dest: Jasně... ukaž, co máš.

String.Source: Jesus, boss. Not sure we can take another hit from the Brotherhood like that.
String.Dest: Jesus, boss. Not sure we can take another hit from the Brotherhood like that.

String.Source: Please buy something and give my life purpose.
String.Dest: Please buy something and give my life purpose.

String.Source: The best part of this job is... let me see... nothing. So you buying something or what?
String.Dest: The best part of this job is... let me see... nothing. So you buying something or what?

String.Source: Stimpaks. RadAway. Sure to cure what ails ya. Except for boredom. Doesn't cure boredom.
String.Dest: Stimpaks. RadAway. Sure to cure what ails ya. Except for boredom. Doesn't cure boredom.

String.Source: Enough! Enough, all right!
String.Dest: Enough! Enough, all right!

String.Source: I'm done with getting pushed around by scum like you.
String.Dest: I'm done with getting pushed around by scum like you.

String.Source: Shank, you'll be the first to know.
String.Dest: Shank, you'll be the first to know.

String.Source: It's good, Shank. I don't bring you bullshit.
String.Dest: It's good, Shank. I don't bring you bullshit.

String.Source: And I'd like to keep it that way.
String.Dest: And I'd like to keep it that way.

String.Source: If there's anything left. How good is this source of yours?
String.Dest: If there's anything left. How good is this source of yours?

String.Source: Here. Earned this. Anything else you find out--
String.Dest: Here. Earned this. Anything else you find out--

String.Source: Word is Super Mutants just hit the place. They're still trying to rebuild. Should be easy pickings.
String.Dest: Word is Super Mutants just hit the place. They're still trying to rebuild. Should be easy pickings.

String.Source: I didn't sign up to be a damn gardener.
String.Dest: I didn't sign up to be a damn gardener.

String.Source: Why am I farming? Do we not have slaves for a reason?
String.Dest: Why am I farming? Do we not have slaves for a reason?

String.Source: Talk about your shit deal.
String.Dest: Talk about your shit deal.

String.Source: A doctor? How did you end up in this place?
String.Dest: A doctor? How did you end up in this place?

String.Source: You're definitely sick, but you don't have enough money to cover my fee. Sorry. Was there something else?
String.Dest: Rozhodně na tom nejsi dobře, ale nemáš dost peněz na zaplacení poplatku. Promiň. Potřebuješ ještě něco?

String.Source: We'll clean you up, don't worry.
String.Dest: Dáme tě dohromady, neboj se.

String.Source: That was it.
String.Dest: That was it.

String.Source: All right. Let's flush your system.
String.Dest: Tak jo. Pročistíme ti organismus.

String.Source: What can I do for you? Treatment or supplies?
String.Dest: What can I do for you? Treatment or supplies?

String.Source: All right. Don't ruin my hard work by dying out there.
String.Dest: Dobře. Pokus se mou práci nezničit tím, že tam venku zemřeš.

String.Source: No other complaints.
String.Dest: Žádné další potíže.

String.Source: Welcome. Dealing with any injuries or illnesses today?
String.Dest: Welcome. Dealing with any injuries or illnesses today?

String.Source: Good. Keep an eye on it, though. What else?
String.Dest: Dobře. Ale hlídej si to. Co dál?

String.Source: I'd like to help you, but I got costs to cover, and you're low on caps. Was there anything else?
String.Dest: Můžu ti pomoct, ale musím platit výdaje a ty nemáš zátky. Ještě něco?

String.Source: You're hurt, all right, but you're also dead broke. Sorry. Anything else?
String.Dest: Máš zranění, to ano, ale taky máš hluboko do kapsy. Promiň. Ještě něco?

String.Source: Done. Now, was there anything else bothering you?
String.Dest: Hotovo. Je tu ještě něco, co tě trápí?

String.Source: You're strung out all right. I got something that can clean you up.
String.Dest: Ano, jsi řádně mimo. Mám něco, co tě dokáže dát dohromady.

String.Source: All done. Any other complaints?
String.Dest: Hotovo. Nějaké další námitky?

String.Source: And that's that. Anything else bothering you?
String.Dest: Tak. Ještě něco tě trápí?

String.Source: Okay. What's troubling you, exactly?
String.Dest: Okay. What's troubling you, exactly?

String.Source: Alright, let's start with your symptoms. What's wrong, exactly?
String.Dest: Alright, let's start with your symptoms. What's wrong, exactly?

String.Source: Of course. What seems to be the trouble?
String.Dest: Of course. What seems to be the trouble?

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: Dobře.

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: Dobrá.

String.Source: Of course. Here's my current stock.
String.Dest: Of course. Here's my current stock.

String.Source: Here's what I've got.
String.Dest: Tohle je všechno, co mám.

String.Source: Sure, take a look.
String.Dest: Sure, take a look.

String.Source: Well, it's a bit of a story. I used to live at a settlement west of here. We got hit by Colter and his gang, back when he had one.
String.Dest: Well, it's a bit of a story. I used to live at a settlement west of here. We got hit by Colter and his gang, back when he had one.

String.Source: Need me to look at you? Or just here for supplies?
String.Dest: Need me to look at you? Or just here for supplies?

String.Source: Need some stims? Or I can patch you up myself.
String.Dest: Need some stims? Or I can patch you up myself.

String.Source: Actually, I need some supplies for the road.
String.Dest: Popravdě, potřebuji zásoby na cestu.

String.Source: I need some supplies, doctor.
String.Dest: Potřebuji zásoby.

String.Source: Could use some supplies, actually.
String.Dest: Vlastně by se mi hodily nějaké zásoby.

String.Source: Glad to hear it. Anything else?
String.Dest: To je dobře. Trápí tě ještě něco jiného?

String.Source: We can help you when you have enough money. Addiction isn't cheap to cure. Anything else?
String.Dest: Můžeme ti pomoci, až budeš mít dost peněz. Vyléčit závislost není levné. Ještě něco?

String.Source: All the rads are gone. Feels great.
String.Dest: Všechna radiace je pryč. Cítím se skvěle.

String.Source: I'm sorry. Cleaning up addiction costs money, and you're short on caps. Was there anything else?
String.Dest: Je mi líto. Léčba závislostí stojí peníze a tobě chybí zátky. Ještě něco?

String.Source: Let's clean you up. Not gonna be pleasant...
String.Dest: Dáme tě do pořádku. Nebude to příjemné...

String.Source: Yeah, you got it bad. Let's flush your system. It's gonna burn like crazy, afterwards, all right?
String.Dest: Jo, nejsi na tom dobře. Pročistíme ti organismus. Potom to bude hrozně pálit, rozumíš?

String.Source: Blood pooling in the gums. Signs of anemia. Yeah. We better clean you up.
String.Dest: Krvácení z dásní. Známky anémie. Jo. Měli bychom tě pročistit.

String.Source: You don't have enough caps for the fee. Sorry. Anything else?
String.Dest: Nemáš dost zátek na poplatek. Promiň. Ještě něco?

String.Source: Very well, then.
String.Dest: No tak dobrá.

String.Source: On your way, then.
String.Dest: No tak padej.

String.Source: Take better care of yourself in the future, okay?
String.Dest: Příště na sebe dávej větší pozor, jo?

String.Source: Feel better now that I'm cleaned up.
String.Dest: Po té detoxikaci se teď cítím líp.

String.Source: No. We're done.
String.Dest: Ne. Jsme hotovi.

String.Source: How are you feeling? I can take care of any sickness or injuries you might have.
String.Dest: How are you feeling? I can take care of any sickness or injuries you might have.

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: Dobrá tedy.

String.Source: Fine. Come back later.
String.Dest: Fajn. Přijď později.

String.Source: I feel a lot better.
String.Dest: Cítím se mnohem lépe.

String.Source: I can help, but not for free. You'll need to come back when you have the caps. You need anything else?
String.Dest: Můžu pomoci, ale ne zadarmo. Budeš se muset vrátit, až budeš mít zátky. Potřebuješ ještě něco?

String.Source: Actually, I need some supplies for my next op.
String.Dest: Popravdě, potřebuji nějaké zásoby na další operaci.

String.Source: We can clean you up, but you don't have enough money to cover the costs. Anything else?
String.Dest: Dokážeme tě dát do pořádku, ale nemáš dost peněz na pokrytí nákladů. Ještě něco?

String.Source: Yes! I was sleeping, okay? It's what people do when they're exhausted.
String.Dest: Yes! I was sleeping, okay? It's what people do when they're exhausted.

String.Source: That's better.
String.Dest: To je lepší.

String.Source: Or maybe you think you're better off out there, alone and unarmed?
String.Dest: Or maybe you think you're better off out there, alone and unarmed?

String.Source: We expect you to show a little appreciation.
String.Dest: We expect you to show a little appreciation.

String.Source: What are you, deaf? Do I need to repeat myself? Were you sleeping, or were you not?
String.Dest: What are you, deaf? Do I need to repeat myself? Were you sleeping, or were you not?

String.Source: Ever since you guys took over, you've been working us around the clock. What do you expect us to do?
String.Dest: Ever since you guys took over, you've been working us around the clock. What do you expect us to do?

String.Source: No. No... I'll, um... I'll get back to work.
String.Dest: No. No... I'll, um... I'll get back to work.

String.Source: You can either do your job and earn your keep, or we can throw your ass outside the park.
String.Dest: You can either do your job and earn your keep, or we can throw your ass outside the park.

String.Source: We make sure you've got enough to eat and drink. We provide security. Without us, you'd be food for the bloodworms.
String.Dest: We make sure you've got enough to eat and drink. We provide security. Without us, you'd be food for the bloodworms.

String.Source: If this is my life, kill me now.
String.Dest: If this is my life, kill me now.

String.Source: Who do I have to kill to get out of here?
String.Dest: Who do I have to kill to get out of here?

String.Source: I swear to god, life doesn't get any more boring than this.
String.Dest: I swear to god, life doesn't get any more boring than this.

String.Source: Beats actually working for a living, I guess.
String.Dest: Beats actually working for a living, I guess.

String.Source: No one's going to hurt the goods on my watch. Unless they earn it.
String.Dest: No one's going to hurt the goods on my watch. Unless they earn it.

String.Source: Gotta be a drink around here. Not sure how much more of this detail I can take sober.
String.Dest: Gotta be a drink around here. Not sure how much more of this detail I can take sober.

String.Source: Must be someone else's turn to babysit the dirt scratchers.
String.Dest: Must be someone else's turn to babysit the dirt scratchers.

String.Source: Who did I piss off to get this detail?
String.Dest: Who did I piss off to get this detail?

String.Source: Don't worry, boss. These dirt scratchers aren't going anywhere.
String.Dest: Don't worry, boss. These dirt scratchers aren't going anywhere.

String.Source: Not that we can't handle it, but more defenses would go a long way. We don't have eyes in the back of our heads.
String.Dest: Not that we can't handle it, but more defenses would go a long way. We don't have eyes in the back of our heads.

String.Source: There ain't anything springing to mind. Been pretty quiet.
String.Dest: There ain't anything springing to mind. Been pretty quiet.

String.Source: If you ain't standing out, you ain't worth looking at.
String.Dest: If you ain't standing out, you ain't worth looking at.

String.Source: Fine. I see how it is.
String.Dest: Fine. I see how it is.

String.Source: We wouldn't complain if a few more defenses were put up around here. It'd be nice to actually get a real break for once.
String.Dest: We wouldn't complain if a few more defenses were put up around here. It'd be nice to actually get a real break for once.

String.Source: I didn't sign up to be a damn dirt-scratcher.
String.Dest: I didn't sign up to be a damn dirt-scratcher.

String.Source: Nice of you to offer, but nah, we're good. Not a bad set up you got here.
String.Dest: Nice of you to offer, but nah, we're good. Not a bad set up you got here.

String.Source: Wanna look good? Then you're going to want to see what I've got in stock.
String.Dest: Wanna look good? Then you're going to want to see what I've got in stock.

String.Source: I always thought the Brotherhood would bring a real fight to the table. So much for that.
String.Dest: I always thought the Brotherhood would bring a real fight to the table. So much for that.

String.Source: We're set... for now. Nice to see you know how to take care of your own.
String.Dest: We're set... for now. Nice to see you know how to take care of your own.

String.Source: Tired of getting holes in your hide?
String.Dest: Tired of getting holes in your hide?

String.Source: Place really needs some more beds, boss. None of us signed up for this crew to sleep in the dirt.
String.Dest: Place really needs some more beds, boss. None of us signed up for this crew to sleep in the dirt.

String.Source: See, now I'm insulted. Feel like the Institute wasn't even trying.
String.Dest: See, now I'm insulted. Feel like the Institute wasn't even trying.

String.Source: Outpost's looking pretty good. Little more clean water and it'll be a hell of a holdout.
String.Dest: Outpost's looking pretty good. Little more clean water and it'll be a hell of a holdout.

String.Source: Ain't enough food around. Can't think about nothing else when you got a hole in your tummy.
String.Dest: Ain't enough food around. Can't think about nothing else when you got a hole in your tummy.

String.Source: One word: beds.
String.Dest: One word: beds.

String.Source: Sure, boss. Let me know if you change your mind.
String.Dest: Sure, boss. Let me know if you change your mind.

String.Source: Clean water's running low, so unless you want this place to turn into a literal shit hole, another source would be much appreciated.
String.Dest: Clean water's running low, so unless you want this place to turn into a literal shit hole, another source would be much appreciated.

String.Source: Hey boss, how about getting a little water around here?
String.Dest: Hey boss, how about getting a little water around here?

String.Source: Food would be nice. You know, keeping us tortured souls who got assigned to this place alive?
String.Dest: Food would be nice. You know, keeping us tortured souls who got assigned to this place alive?

String.Source: That was fun while it lasted.
String.Dest: That was fun while it lasted.

String.Source: Ain't enough places to sleep. Think maybe you could do something about that?
String.Dest: Ain't enough places to sleep. Think maybe you could do something about that?

String.Source: Bad hangover? Gushing too much blood? I got just the thing.
String.Dest: Bad hangover? Gushing too much blood? I got just the thing.

String.Source: There anything I need to know about the outpost?
String.Dest: There anything I need to know about the outpost?

String.Source: This is what I got.
String.Dest: This is what I got.

String.Source: Don't worry 'bout me. Ain't planning on dying any time soon.
String.Dest: Don't worry 'bout me. Ain't planning on dying any time soon.

String.Source: Sure as hell didn't join this crew to dig up dirt.
String.Dest: Sure as hell didn't join this crew to dig up dirt.

String.Source: You need a weapon? I got tons.
String.Dest: You need a weapon? I got tons.

String.Source: Honestly, not really. Comfy little set-up you've put together.
String.Dest: Honestly, not really. Comfy little set-up you've put together.

String.Source: Running on fumes here, boss. Outpost really needs some more places to sleep.
String.Dest: Running on fumes here, boss. Outpost really needs some more places to sleep.

String.Source: Not enough water around here to drink. And we're almost through the booze.
String.Dest: Not enough water around here to drink. And we're almost through the booze.

String.Source: Yeah, more defenses. We love a good fight, but we're getting pretty sick of always watching our backs.
String.Dest: Yeah, more defenses. We love a good fight, but we're getting pretty sick of always watching our backs.

String.Source: If I wanted to starve I'd run with the local Raiders. Where's the food?
String.Dest: If I wanted to starve I'd run with the local Raiders. Where's the food?

String.Source: Pretty boring. Wouldn't mind some action.
String.Dest: Pretty boring. Wouldn't mind some action.

String.Source: I'm fucking hungry. And so is everyone else.
String.Dest: I'm fucking hungry. And so is everyone else.

String.Source: People are bitching about not having enough water. You might want to do something about that.
String.Dest: People are bitching about not having enough water. You might want to do something about that.

String.Source: Need a piece? Welcome to check the stock.
String.Dest: Need a piece? Welcome to check the stock.

String.Source: Need to rinse the grime out?
String.Dest: Need to rinse the grime out?

String.Source: Seriously, boss? Farming ain't exactly my area of expertise.
String.Dest: Seriously, boss? Farming ain't exactly my area of expertise.

String.Source: Not off the top of my head. I'll let you know if something comes to me.
String.Dest: Not off the top of my head. I'll let you know if something comes to me.

String.Source: Another day of farming and I think I'm going to off myself.
String.Dest: Another day of farming and I think I'm going to off myself.

String.Source: Plenty of chems available, boss. Show you what I got?
String.Dest: Plenty of chems available, boss. Show you what I got?

String.Source: Like what you see?
String.Dest: Like what you see?

String.Source: I'd hook us up with some clean water before you have a revolt on your hands. Fair warning.
String.Dest: I'd hook us up with some clean water before you have a revolt on your hands. Fair warning.

String.Source: Could use some more clean water, to be honest. Might be trouble if people keep having to go without.
String.Dest: Could use some more clean water, to be honest. Might be trouble if people keep having to go without.

String.Source: Yeah, these little things called beds. I guess you haven't heard of them since there's not enough to go around. But now that you have, no excuses.
String.Dest: Yeah, these little things called beds. I guess you haven't heard of them since there's not enough to go around. But now that you have, no excuses.

String.Source: The Institute ain't going to mess with us any time soon. If they're smart.
String.Dest: The Institute ain't going to mess with us any time soon. If they're smart.

String.Source: Damn Super Mutants come in here and tear the place up.
String.Dest: Damn Super Mutants come in here and tear the place up.

String.Source: Clothes make the killer. Looking to buy?
String.Dest: Clothes make the killer. Looking to buy?

String.Source: Uh, yeah, this little thing called food? We aren't slaves here last I checked.
String.Dest: Uh, yeah, this little thing called food? We aren't slaves here last I checked.

String.Source: I'll just rub a couple handfuls of dirt on it. I'll be fine.
String.Dest: I'll just rub a couple handfuls of dirt on it. I'll be fine.

String.Source: Whatever.
String.Dest: Když to říkáš.

String.Source: How about setting up some more defenses? I mean, we can handle our shit, but come on. We're supposed to be living the good life here.
String.Dest: How about setting up some more defenses? I mean, we can handle our shit, but come on. We're supposed to be living the good life here.

String.Source: Brotherhood got a bloody nose here, no doubt about it.
String.Dest: Bratrstvo tady dostalo po čumáku, to je bez debat.

String.Source: Hope you're looking to buy. I'm not doing this for my health, you know.
String.Dest: Hope you're looking to buy. I'm not doing this for my health, you know.

String.Source: Damn. The Overboss in the flesh. So I heard this was the crew to join. Got something you need done?
String.Dest: Damn. The Overboss in the flesh. So I heard this was the crew to join. Got something you need done?

String.Source: Don't let those caps burn a hole in your pocket. I bet I got something you need.
String.Dest: Don't let those caps burn a hole in your pocket. I bet I got something you need.

String.Source: Think we underestimated those Institute bastards. That won't happen again.
String.Dest: Think we underestimated those Institute bastards. That won't happen again.

String.Source: You need something or someone dead? You've come to the right place.
String.Dest: You need something or someone dead? You've come to the right place.

String.Source: Brotherhood sure messed this place up.
String.Dest: Brotherhood sure messed this place up.

String.Source: A little help with repairs never hurt anyone. We aren't exactly... stellar mechanics.
String.Dest: A little help with repairs never hurt anyone. We aren't exactly... stellar mechanics.

String.Source: Heard any rumors about how folks are feeling around here?
String.Dest: Heard any rumors about how folks are feeling around here?

String.Source: Could really use some more places to sleep around here. Crew's starting to look like zombies.
String.Dest: Could really use some more places to sleep around here. Crew's starting to look like zombies.

String.Source: Worst thing about dealing with Super Mutants is getting rid of the bodies. Those things weigh a ton.
String.Dest: Worst thing about dealing with Super Mutants is getting rid of the bodies. Those things weigh a ton.

String.Source: We're starving to death here, boss. Considering eating some pets if things don't change.
String.Dest: We're starving to death here, boss. Considering eating some pets if things don't change.

String.Source: Parched? Plenty of refreshments that'll help you forget the day.
String.Dest: Parched? Plenty of refreshments that'll help you forget the day.

String.Source: Looking to eat less lead? I've got some armor that should help, if you're interested.
String.Dest: Looking to eat less lead? I've got some armor that should help, if you're interested.

String.Source: Muties sure ripped the place up bad, boss.
String.Dest: Muties sure ripped the place up bad, boss.

String.Source: What'll it be, boss?
String.Dest: What'll it be, boss?

String.Source: You want any of this?
String.Dest: You want any of this?

String.Source: No skin off my teeth.
String.Dest: No skin off my teeth.

String.Source: There anything I need to know about the outpost?
String.Dest: There anything I need to know about the outpost?

String.Source: What? I can't keep it?
String.Dest: What? I can't keep it?

String.Source: If you need some supplies, you're in the right place.
String.Dest: If you need some supplies, you're in the right place.

String.Source: Anything going on around here that I should know about?
String.Dest: Anything going on around here that I should know about?

String.Source: What's up with the shitty food supply? We aren't slaves here you know.
String.Dest: What's up with the shitty food supply? We aren't slaves here you know.

String.Source: You should know, people been bitching about the bed situation.
String.Dest: You should know, people been bitching about the bed situation.

String.Source: We've been trying to get everything repaired around here, but if you could take a look at some of these things, it'd get us back on our feet quicker.
String.Dest: We've been trying to get everything repaired around here, but if you could take a look at some of these things, it'd get us back on our feet quicker.

String.Source: Place could really use some more beds. Going to be some blood if folks don't start getting more shut-eye.
String.Dest: Place could really use some more beds. Going to be some blood if folks don't start getting more shut-eye.

String.Source: Couple more beds would be nice. Awful hard staying sharp when you haven't slept.
String.Dest: Couple more beds would be nice. Awful hard staying sharp when you haven't slept.

String.Source: You need protection? I got you covered.
String.Dest: You need protection? I got you covered.

String.Source: Outpost could use some repairs. Go a lot faster if you'd be willing to pitch in.
String.Dest: Outpost could use some repairs. Go a lot faster if you'd be willing to pitch in.

String.Source: Everything I've got.
String.Dest: Everything I've got.

String.Source: Outpost's been real short on grub, boss. Hard as hell to get the drop on someone with a growling gut.
String.Dest: Outpost's been real short on grub, boss. Hard as hell to get the drop on someone with a growling gut.

String.Source: Need some water, boss. I can taste my own mouth. It's fucking gross.
String.Dest: Need some water, boss. I can taste my own mouth. It's fucking gross.

String.Source: Anyone could just slip in here. How about some more defenses? Turrets and whatnot.
String.Dest: Anyone could just slip in here. How about some more defenses? Turrets and whatnot.

String.Source: Hey. Hey, you're the Overboss. I just joined up. There anything you need done?
String.Dest: Hey. Hey, you're the Overboss. I just joined up. There anything you need done?

String.Source: Hmm... yeah, I think we got an outfit or two that'll suit you. Want to see the wares?
String.Dest: Hmm... yeah, I think we got an outfit or two that'll suit you. Want to see the wares?

String.Source: Suit yourself.
String.Dest: Posluž si.

String.Source: If you don't hook us up with more food soon, you're gonna have a revolt on your hands.
String.Dest: If you don't hook us up with more food soon, you're gonna have a revolt on your hands.

String.Source: See something you like, you just say the word.
String.Dest: See something you like, you just say the word.

String.Source: Uph. Institute brought the big guns in for that one.
String.Dest: Uph. Institute brought the big guns in for that one.

String.Source: Nah, boss. You got this place set up right. But if you need anything, you let me know.
String.Dest: Nah, boss. You got this place set up right. But if you need anything, you let me know.

String.Source: Works for me.
String.Dest: Souhlasím.

String.Source: We got a few things that won't fix themselves. You help us with repairs, we can be sure to hold this place against anything.
String.Dest: We got a few things that won't fix themselves. You help us with repairs, we can be sure to hold this place against anything.

String.Source: I'm all right, boss. Be good as new in no time.
String.Dest: I'm all right, boss. Be good as new in no time.

String.Source: God damn, I'm parched, boss. Need some water, real bad.
String.Dest: God damn, I'm parched, boss. Need some water, real bad.

String.Source: You got a problem? I got permanent solutions. All kinds of 'em.
String.Dest: You got a problem? I got permanent solutions. All kinds of 'em.

String.Source: Not getting rid of me that easily, boss.
String.Dest: Not getting rid of me that easily, boss.

String.Source: So, there something I should be doing around here?
String.Dest: So, there something I should be doing around here?

String.Source: Want to make something dead? Take a look at what I've got.
String.Dest: Want to make something dead? Take a look at what I've got.

String.Source: Rest your paws and grab a drink.
String.Dest: Rest your paws and grab a drink.

String.Source: Looking to take someone out? Got all sorts of goodies that ought to do the trick.
String.Dest: Looking to take someone out? Got all sorts of goodies that ought to do the trick.

String.Source: I've been in worse shape. I'll be fine.
String.Dest: I've been in worse shape. I'll be fine.

String.Source: From the looks of it, you sure could use something I have.
String.Dest: From the looks of it, you sure could use something I have.

String.Source: Food. Ever heard of it? Get us some.
String.Dest: Food. Ever heard of it? Get us some.

String.Source: Need some extra protection, boss? Welcome to check what I've got.
String.Dest: Need some extra protection, boss? Welcome to check what I've got.

String.Source: Dress to impress!
String.Dest: Dress to impress!

String.Source: Whatever you want.
String.Dest: Jak si přeješ.

String.Source: Heard any rumors about how folks are feeling around here?
String.Dest: Heard any rumors about how folks are feeling around here?

String.Source: Need. Water.
String.Dest: Need. Water.

String.Source: I'll get back to picking my teeth then.
String.Dest: I'll get back to picking my teeth then.

String.Source: Ain't nothing comes to mind.
String.Dest: Ain't nothing comes to mind.

String.Source: Here you go.
String.Dest: Tady je.

String.Source: Guaranteed to save your life, or your money back.
String.Dest: Guaranteed to save your life, or your money back.

String.Source: Repairing damage for one. The only experience I have with tools is turning them into weapons.
String.Dest: Repairing damage for one. The only experience I have with tools is turning them into weapons.

String.Source: Boss. Looking for a stiff drink?
String.Dest: Boss. Looking for a stiff drink?

String.Source: Overboss. Bet you could use a drink. Just got to show me the caps.
String.Dest: Overboss. Bet you could use a drink. Just got to show me the caps.

String.Source: We got a good thing going here. But it ain't gonna last if we all starve to death.
String.Dest: We got a good thing going here. But it ain't gonna last if we all starve to death.

String.Source: Pretty plush set-up, boss. Only thing - needs a couple more places for folks to sleep.
String.Dest: Pretty plush set-up, boss. Only thing - needs a couple more places for folks to sleep.

String.Source: Whole mess of nothing, boss. Things have been pretty calm.
String.Dest: Whole mess of nothing, boss. Things have been pretty calm.

String.Source: So I got to farm, why? You can't convince anyone to cough up some grub?
String.Dest: So I got to farm, why? You can't convince anyone to cough up some grub?

String.Source: What the hell did those Mutants think was going to happen?
String.Dest: What the hell did those Mutants think was going to happen?

String.Source: We've got some outstanding repairs that could do with some attention. If it ain't below ya, boss, it'd be a big help.
String.Dest: We've got some outstanding repairs that could do with some attention. If it ain't below ya, boss, it'd be a big help.

String.Source: Ain't enough beds to go around. Someone's gonna get stabbed over it. Any day now.
String.Dest: Ain't enough beds to go around. Someone's gonna get stabbed over it. Any day now.

String.Source: Hey boss. You starving us on purpose?
String.Dest: Hey boss. You starving us on purpose?

String.Source: Sneaky bastard. Didn't see it coming.
String.Dest: Sneaky bastard. Didn't see it coming.

String.Source: Yeah, okay.
String.Dest: Yeah, okay.

String.Source: Yeah, we aren't animals here. Good water's running low, and if people get sick, I can tell you who's not going to clean up the mess.
String.Dest: Yeah, we aren't animals here. Good water's running low, and if people get sick, I can tell you who's not going to clean up the mess.

String.Source: Boss, you want me doing something?
String.Dest: Boss, you want me doing something?

String.Source: I guess so.
String.Dest: Asi ano.

String.Source: Fine by me, boss.
String.Dest: Fine by me, boss.

String.Source: I got a little bit of everything. You buying?
String.Dest: I got a little bit of everything. You buying?

String.Source: Tired of those rags? Take a look at these.
String.Dest: Tired of those rags? Take a look at these.

String.Source: You keep everything good for yourself, is that it? Fine.
String.Dest: You keep everything good for yourself, is that it? Fine.

String.Source: Hey boss. Just got here. There something you want me to do?
String.Dest: Hey boss. Just got here. There something you want me to do?

String.Source: Sure thing.
String.Dest: Jasňačka.

String.Source: Hurt? This stuff might help. Hope you know what you're doing.
String.Dest: Hurt? This stuff might help. Hope you know what you're doing.

String.Source: Anything going on around here that I should know about?
String.Dest: Anything going on around here that I should know about?

String.Source: Best offense is still being alive. My armor will help. Want to check the goods?
String.Dest: Best offense is still being alive. My armor will help. Want to check the goods?

String.Source: Running low on food, so any solutions would be great.
String.Dest: Running low on food, so any solutions would be great.

String.Source: Got a chem for whatever ails ya, boss. Take a look at what I've got?
String.Dest: Got a chem for whatever ails ya, boss. Take a look at what I've got?

String.Source: You looking to stock up? I can help.
String.Dest: You looking to stock up? I can help.

String.Source: Hard to get some real shut-eye around here. Outpost could really use some beds.
String.Dest: Hard to get some real shut-eye around here. Outpost could really use some beds.

String.Source: Overboss. Hi. Don't think we've met yet. If there's anything I can do, you let me know.
String.Dest: Overboss. Hi. Don't think we've met yet. If there's anything I can do, you let me know.

String.Source: Figures.
String.Dest: Figures.

String.Source: Tired of rubbing dirt on your wounds?
String.Dest: Tired of rubbing dirt on your wounds?

String.Source: Boss. We're sitting ducks here. How about putting up a couple more walls and turrets or something?
String.Dest: Boss. We're sitting ducks here. How about putting up a couple more walls and turrets or something?

String.Source: Let me tell you, we really, really value our sleep. I'd hate to see what happens when we don't get enough due to the silly lack of beds here.
String.Dest: Let me tell you, we really, really value our sleep. I'd hate to see what happens when we don't get enough due to the silly lack of beds here.

String.Source: Same shit, different day.
String.Dest: Same shit, different day.

String.Source: Been pretty dull, honestly, boss.
String.Dest: Been pretty dull, honestly, boss.

String.Source: Can't think of anything. Well, besides needing some live target practice. But with any luck, we'll get some visitors soon enough.
String.Dest: Can't think of anything. Well, besides needing some live target practice. But with any luck, we'll get some visitors soon enough.

String.Source: Water. Ever hear of it?
String.Dest: Water. Ever hear of it?

String.Source: Brotherhood hit us hard. Real hard.
String.Dest: Brotherhood hit us hard. Real hard.

String.Source: Aww man. Was just getting the hang of it.
String.Dest: Aww man. Was just getting the hang of it.

String.Source: People are having to sleep in shifts. It's making everyone a bit cranky.
String.Dest: Lidé musí spát na směny. Každý je z toho mrzutý.

String.Source: You looking to heal up or get high? Either way, I got something for you.
String.Dest: You looking to heal up or get high? Either way, I got something for you.

String.Source: No problem.
String.Dest: Žádný problém.

String.Source: Not enough clean water. People and pets are getting sick.
String.Dest: Not enough clean water. People and pets are getting sick.

String.Source: I thought the whole point was to make other people grow the food for us.
String.Dest: I thought the whole point was to make other people grow the food for us.

String.Source: So damn hungry.
String.Dest: So damn hungry.

String.Source: Been some squabbles breaking out over water, boss. What's it going to take to get another pump or two?
String.Dest: Been some squabbles breaking out over water, boss. What's it going to take to get another pump or two?

String.Source: I made a mistake. I'll stop helping the Raiders.
String.Dest: Moje chyba. Už dál nehodlám pomáhat nájezdíkům.

String.Source: The Commonwealth will never belong to scum like you.
String.Dest: The Commonwealth will never belong to scum like you.

String.Source: I hope those are more than just words.
String.Dest: I hope those are more than just words.

String.Source: Simple. Prove that you're on the right side.
String.Dest: Simple. Prove that you're on the right side.

String.Source: If you consider that kind of scum "friends" then I don't see much point in talking to you.
String.Dest: If you consider that kind of scum "friends" then I don't see much point in talking to you.

String.Source: The last thing the Commonwealth needs is another gang of Raiders.
String.Dest: Poslední věc, kterou Commonwealth potřebuje je jiný gang nájezdníků.

String.Source: Trust me. I've got things under control.
String.Dest: Trust me. I've got things under control.

String.Source: Wipe out those Raiders instead of helping them.
String.Dest: Zlikviduj nájezníky namísto pomoci.

String.Source: You need to make sure they can't threaten the Commonwealth again. You need to wipe them out.
String.Dest: You need to make sure they can't threaten the Commonwealth again. You need to wipe them out.

String.Source: I'll have to think about that.
String.Dest: I'll have to think about that.

String.Source: I hope it doesn't come to that.
String.Dest: I hope it doesn't come to that.

String.Source: I know you'll do the right thing in the end.
String.Dest: I know you'll do the right thing in the end.

String.Source: What do you want? Did you really think I wouldn't find out about what you've been doing?
String.Dest: What do you want? Did you really think I wouldn't find out about what you've been doing?

String.Source: You're going to have to do more than that.
String.Dest: You're going to have to do more than that.

String.Source: Don't get in my way if you know what's good for you.
String.Dest: Don't get in my way if you know what's good for you.

String.Source: I'm the leader of the gang. The Commonwealth is ours now.
String.Dest: I'm the leader of the gang. The Commonwealth is ours now.

String.Source: You want me to betray my friends?
String.Dest: Chceš, ať zradím své přátele?

String.Source: You're making it damn hard for me to believe you're someone I should trust.
String.Dest: You're making it damn hard for me to believe you're someone I should trust.

String.Source: What can I do to make things right?
String.Dest: What can I do to make things right?

String.Source: Okay, I will. I'll wipe them out.
String.Dest: Okay, I will. I'll wipe them out.

String.Source: I called out for a cease fire on the condition that I'd see to their injuries as well as ours. Saved a few lives that day, including Colter's.
String.Dest: I called out for a cease fire on the condition that I'd see to their injuries as well as ours. Saved a few lives that day, including Colter's.

String.Source: Now this place is my home.
String.Dest: Now this place is my home.

String.Source: When he set up this place, he came back for me. Said if I came along, he'd make sure his guys wouldn't hit our settlement again.
String.Dest: When he set up this place, he came back for me. Said if I came along, he'd make sure his guys wouldn't hit our settlement again.

String.Source: It was a tough fight. We killed some of theirs, they killed some of ours. There were wounded on both sides, but nobody could get to them.
String.Dest: It was a tough fight. We killed some of theirs, they killed some of ours. There were wounded on both sides, but nobody could get to them.

String.Source: All I know is, Gage was in the Mountain the other day and he had a real long talk with Nisha... in private.
String.Dest: All I know is, Gage was in the Mountain the other day and he had a real long talk with Nisha... in private.

String.Source: Gage? The hell with that guy. What's he ever done around here?
String.Dest: Gage? The hell with that guy. What's he ever done around here?

String.Source: What do I look like, an idiot?
String.Dest: What do I look like, an idiot?

String.Source: So let me get this straight. Some scavver makes it through the Gauntlet, takes out the boss, and now we're all supposed to follow him?
String.Dest: So let me get this straight. Some scavver makes it through the Gauntlet, takes out the boss, and now we're all supposed to follow him?

String.Source: Hey, I'm just telling you what I saw. You want to know more about what's going on, then maybe you should ask Mason.
String.Dest: Hey, I'm just telling you what I saw. You want to know more about what's going on, then maybe you should ask Mason.

String.Source: What happens next is up to you. You can take 'em on yourself in the arena, or I can make sure our little rat never gets out of the maze.
String.Dest: What happens next is up to you. You can take 'em on yourself in the arena, or I can make sure our little rat never gets out of the maze.

String.Source: Boss, someone's coming through the Gauntlet! Go see Fritsch, he'll tell you what to do.
String.Dest: Boss, someone's coming through the Gauntlet! Go see Fritsch, he'll tell you what to do.

String.Source: Just head for the arena whenever you're ready, boss.
String.Dest: Just head for the arena whenever you're ready, boss.

String.Source: Hell yeah! No better way to earn a raider's respect than kicking some ass in front of a crowd.
String.Dest: Hell yeah! No better way to earn a raider's respect than kicking some ass in front of a crowd.

String.Source: What happens if choose to fight?
String.Dest: What happens if choose to fight?

String.Source: Time to put on a show.
String.Dest: Time to put on a show.

String.Source: All you need to do is gear up and head for the arena. Bring whatever weapons and armor you want.
String.Dest: All you need to do is gear up and head for the arena. Bring whatever weapons and armor you want.

String.Source: I heard you were looking for me?
String.Dest: I heard you were looking for me?

String.Source: Got another one coming through the Gauntlet, boss. Fritsch is waiting for you.
String.Dest: Got another one coming through the Gauntlet, boss. Fritsch is waiting for you.

String.Source: You heard the alarm, right? That means someone's in the Gauntlet. Looks like a real tough one, too.
String.Dest: You heard the alarm, right? That means someone's in the Gauntlet. Looks like a real tough one, too.

String.Source: Gotta admit though, I was looking forward to watching you kick ass and break bones. Maybe next time.
String.Dest: Gotta admit though, I was looking forward to watching you kick ass and break bones. Maybe next time.

String.Source: Not a problem, boss. I'll make sure it gets done.
String.Dest: Not a problem, boss. I'll make sure it gets done.

String.Source: Damn, really? Well, you're the boss. Won't pretend I'm not disappointed, though.
String.Dest: Damn, really? Well, you're the boss. Won't pretend I'm not disappointed, though.

String.Source: So, what's the call, boss? You gonna give us a show, or what?
String.Dest: So, what's the call, boss? You gonna give us a show, or what?

String.Source: Then we open up the door to the Gauntlet and let in whatever dumb-ass scavver mark fell into the trap. After that? Play time.
String.Dest: Then we open up the door to the Gauntlet and let in whatever dumb-ass scavver mark fell into the trap. After that? Play time.

String.Source: You make up your mind yet, boss? You gonna grease this wasteland scum?
String.Dest: You make up your mind yet, boss? You gonna grease this wasteland scum?

String.Source: Just get rid of 'em, I don't care how.
String.Dest: Just get rid of 'em, I don't care how.

String.Source: There's not going to be a fight. Set them free.
String.Dest: There's not going to be a fight. Set them free.

String.Source: Guess you heard the alarm, huh? Well, you know the deal. You want to take down another worthless wastelander?
String.Dest: Guess you heard the alarm, huh? Well, you know the deal. You want to take down another worthless wastelander?

String.Source: How does that work? He ain't even a Raider!
String.Dest: How does that work? He ain't even a Raider!

String.Source: So let me get this straight. Some scavver makes it through the Gauntlet, takes out the boss, and now we're all supposed to follow her?
String.Dest: So let me get this straight. Some scavver makes it through the Gauntlet, takes out the boss, and now we're all supposed to follow her?

String.Source: How does that work? She ain't even a Raider!
String.Dest: How does that work? She ain't even a Raider!

String.Source: *Laughing*
String.Dest: *smích*

String.Source: Turned 'em loose outside the gate.
String.Dest: Turned 'em loose outside the gate.

String.Source: You serious?
String.Dest: You serious?

String.Source: You've been hitting the Jet pretty hard. Get some of that new Calmex stuff that Maddox cooked up. It'll set you right.
String.Dest: You've been hitting the Jet pretty hard. Get some of that new Calmex stuff that Maddox cooked up. It'll set you right.

String.Source: It's not too late to do the right thing, you know.
String.Dest: It's not too late to do the right thing, you know.

String.Source: Man, I've been getting the shakes bad. Haven't slept in days.
String.Dest: Man, I've been getting the shakes bad. Haven't slept in days.

String.Source: Heard you put a pretty good beat-down on Val. What happened?
String.Dest: Heard you put a pretty good beat-down on Val. What happened?

String.Source: Caught one of the traders stealing food.
String.Dest: Caught one of the traders stealing food.

String.Source: Hell no, this is the best buzz I ever had.
String.Dest: Hell no, this is the best buzz I ever had.

String.Source: Yeah, then I got in a little extra target practice.
String.Dest: Yeah, then I got in a little extra target practice.

String.Source: *Laughing*
String.Dest: *smích*

String.Source: Yeah? What did you do to 'em?
String.Dest: Yeah? What did you do to 'em?

String.Source: You could start by proving you're on the right side.
String.Dest: You could start by proving you're on the right side.

String.Source: Dumb-ass traders.
String.Dest: Dumb-ass traders.

String.Source: I remember.
String.Dest: I remember.

String.Source: I was out of smokes, and she didn't want to hook me up.
String.Dest: I was out of smokes, and she didn't want to hook me up.

String.Source: Hell, in that case she deserved it. I've done a lot worse for a cigarette.
String.Dest: Hell, in that case she deserved it. I've done a lot worse for a cigarette.

String.Source: Anyway, anything can I do for you? Treatment or supplies?
String.Dest: Anyway, anything can I do for you? Treatment or supplies?

String.Source: Scrapes and bruises, but it's probably a good idea to get them fixed up.
String.Dest: Škrábance a modřiny, ale bylo by dobré je ošetřit.

String.Source: Good, hope it stays that way. Anything else?
String.Dest: Good, hope it stays that way. Anything else?

String.Source: Glad to hear it. Anything else?
String.Dest: To je dobře. Trápí tě ještě něco jiného?

String.Source: Severe lacerations, puncture wounds, muscle spasms in the eyes from high levels of stress... Yeah, let's patch you up.
String.Dest: Závažné tržné rány, bodná zranění, škubání očních svalů způsobené nadměrným stresem... jop, dejme se do toho.

String.Source: Good. Anything else?
String.Dest: Dobře. Něco dalšího?

String.Source: Eh, I've seen worse. Better stitch you up before infection sets in, though.
String.Dest: No, existují i horší zranění. Raději to ale zašiju, než se infekce rozšíří.

String.Source: Oh wow, that's a lot of blood. We'll need to operate right away.
String.Dest: No páni, to je hodně krve. Budeme muset okamžitě operovat.

String.Source: Hmm... gonna need to brace those fractures, apply some cream for the burns, a few sets of stitches. Better get to it...
String.Dest: Budu muset dát dohromady ty zlomeniny, nanést krém na popáleniny a pár stehů. Raději se už do toho pustím...

String.Source: Off you go, then.
String.Dest: Tak tedy příště.

String.Source: Huh, you look fine, but... oh wait... yep, that's gonna need to be set back in place. Let's get started.
String.Dest: Myslím, že vypadáš dobře... počkat... jo, to budu muset narovnat. Tak tedy začneme.

String.Source: The last thing the Commonwealth needs is another gang of Raiders.
String.Dest: Poslední věc, kterou Commonwealth potřebuje je jiný gang nájezdníků.

String.Source: You could start by proving you're on the right side.
String.Dest: You could start by proving you're on the right side.

String.Source: You're making it damn hard for me to believe you're someone I should trust.
String.Dest: You're making it damn hard for me to believe you're someone I should trust.

String.Source: What do you say? Will you be the leader that the Commonwealth needs? Will you rebuild the Minutemen?
String.Dest: Tak co říkáš? Staneš se vůdcem, kterého Commonwealth potřebuje? Obnovíš Minutemany?

String.Source: You know how to throw a punch, I'll give you that.
String.Dest: Víš, jak rozdávat rány, to ti musím nechat.

String.Source: Come on. Let's see what you've got.
String.Dest: Tak pojď. Uvidíme, co v tobě je.

String.Source: You ready to help out?
String.Dest: Můžeš teď pomoct?
